channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12730] Backport HBASE-5162 (Basic client pushback mechanism) to branch-1
item.summary: Backport HBASE-5162 (Basic client pushback mechanism) to branch-1

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This feature will probably be in 0.98.10. Should we have this in branch-1.0 also Enis Soztutar to prevent a feature discontinuity?

Incorporates both addendums to HBASE-5162 found in trunk, HBASE-12838, HBASE-12839, and HBASE-12840. New end to end test TestClientPushback passes locally 10 of 10 times. Setting patch available but Jenkins will fail to apply it for the precommit build.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12693450/HBASE-12730-branch-1.patch
against master branch at commit 9bdb81f0a1db308a8a452379455b6bbfe70ea20d.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12693450

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 9 new or modified tests.

-1 patch. The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/12522//console

This message is automatically generated.

Can I get a review please?
Enis Soztutar Jesse Yates Lars Hofhansl

ltgm. Only question - do we want to keep the double-checked logic in the ServerStatisticTracker? I know there was the issue to improve that, but maybe thats a follow up for all branches?

Otherwise, +1, assuming tests pass
Thanks for noticing. I missed HBASE-12839. Attached updated patch.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12693951/HBASE-12730-branch-1.patch
against master branch at commit 319f9bb7918af8cfe7e65f97b654f37f0d5983f3.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12693951

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 23 new or modified tests.

-1 patch. The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/12553//console

This message is automatically generated.
I think we need this in 1.0 to avoid a feature discontinuity so will be pushing to branch-1.0 also.
Last patch attached here included unrelated diffs because my local branch-1 was out of date, attaching what I committed.
